description.value:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

Requirements You are photon-attuned.

You unleash your pent-up aggression, causing it to erupt like the stellar events that end stars. You can choose to affect creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:15]{15-foot} or @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]. Each affected creature takes @Damage[(@actor.level)d8[fire]] damage and must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|against:class] save against your class DC. If you choose the 30-foot option, you instead deal @Damage[(@actor.level)d6[fire]] damage.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is blinded for 1 minute.

Level (+1) Increase the damage by 1d8 (or 1d6 for the 30-foot version).
